rules.description: Roll a D6 each time a friendly Astra Militarum Infantry Character (excluding Ogryns) loses a wound whilst they are within 3" of any models with this ability; on a 3+ the Astra Militarum character does not lose a wound but one model with this ability suffers a mortal wound. In addition, this model may not be selected as your Warlord, and may not be given a Warlord Trait.
rules.name: Bodyguard
